Here is a User guide about how to catch the llvm/clang source codes via svn: 

http://llvm.org/docs/GettingStarted.html#checkout

Up to now, I checkout 169597 svn branch and it works.

===1, Get the source.===
{{{
$cd where-you-want-llvm-to-live
$svn co http://llvm.org/svn/llvm-project/llvm/trunk llvm-svn -r 169597

$cd where-you-want-llvm-to-live
$cd llvm-svn/tools
$svn co http://llvm.org/svn/llvm-project/cfe/trunk clang -r 169597

$cd where-you-want-llvm-to-live
$cd llvm-svn/projects
$svn co http://llvm.org/svn/llvm-project/compiler-rt/trunk compiler-rt -r 169597
}}}

===2. Configure/build and install it. ===
{{{
$./configure --prefix=/usr  --enable-optimized
$make 
$make install
}}}
